React

Summary

(Mostly) front-end framework and ecosystem for JavaScript

Jots

React’s unopinionated core means there’s a big ecosystem, but bikeshedding and wheel reinvention are common problems

react is the core React library.

react-dom provides DOM-specific methods that enable you to use React with the DOM.

JSX

JavaScript syntax extension enabling HTML-like syntax

Writing Markup with JSX – React

The three rules of JSX

Return a single root element

Close all the tags

camelCase most of the things

strokeWidth instead of stroke-width, className instead of class

Components are self-contained, reusable snippets of code that provide the building blocks for user interfaces.

Props let you pass information to components as properties. Information flows down the component tree through props — one-way data flow

React hooks let you add state and other additional logic to components.
